text: Enywe abasuubila, mureo abaloli babili abaleng’afu mwinywe ebise biokhulaka lifwa niliulila mulala wenyu. Nende abandi balali mwinywe tawe; Olwa muba nimuli khuluchendo, mana amasila kelifwa nikaboolela. Mulabemia babili abo iswala niyakhawa, mana betsube mulira lia Nyasaye nimuba nimuli nende inganakani- (khu bulaame obo) “shikhubukulekhwo shiosi shiosi tawe, kata nali Omundu wefu, ne shikhulafisa obuloli bwa Nyasaye tawe, toto nikhukhola khurio khulaba mubandu abamabii
